video.title: Dónde está Elisa
video.synopsis: After 17 years of happy marriage, the Altamira's face a crisis when their daughter doesn't come home one night. Everything points to kidnapping.

episodes.synopsis: The Altamiras celebrate Mariano's birthday. Elisa goes out to a night club, but later disappears. The police find her dress on the beach.
episodes.title: Sospecha muerta

episodes.synopsis: The investigation continues, fueled by secrets kept by the people involved. The kidnappers want $2 million; Mariano takes the money to the dropoff.
episodes.title: Pistas contrareloj

episodes.synopsis: Mariano can't find his daughter and the kidnapper demands $2 million more. The police get involved in the case.
episodes.title: Dinero en mano

episodes.synopsis: The kidnapper is identified but not killed; Elisa is not found. Some secrets are exposed and others emerge.
episodes.title: Enemigo sin rostro

episodes.synopsis: The investigation forces Detective Cristóbal to relive his own tragic past. They discover Elisa sent someone a message to meet her at the beach.
episodes.title: Impulsos del dolor

episodes.synopsis: Santiago is arrested and questioned. He claims he never received Elisa's message. Dana does not trust Mariano, and Cristóbal thinks everyone is lying.
episodes.title: Secretos extraños

episodes.synopsis: Nicolás and Cecilia have a relationship, and she discovers that Mariano and Isabel are lovers. The detective decides Santiago was not with Elisa.
episodes.title: Juego de pruebas

episodes.synopsis: They discover Elisa's blood on Eduardo's clothes and the fact that she missed a week of classes. Cruz leaks information about the case to the press.
episodes.title: Secretos develados

episodes.synopsis: Mariano discovers that Elisa knew about his love affair with Isabel. They find out that Isabel faked a medical certificate for Elisa.
episodes.title: Secreto por descubrir

episodes.synopsis: Viviana discovers that Ricardo is gay. Dana breaks down when a medallion that apparently belongs to Elisa is found.
episodes.title: Corazonada de madre

episodes.synopsis: A cabin is discovered where Elisa spent several days. Rivas finds a man's fingerprints, and Dana goes with him to the scene of the crime.
episodes.title: Instinto maternal

episodes.synopsis: Mariano doesn't want Dana seeing Cristóbal. When Bruno almost catches his wife Cecilia with her lover, he decides to move out.
episodes.title: Rival de sospechas

episodes.synopsis: Mariano uses the family tragedy in Cristóbal's past against the detective. Cristóbal is overlooked by his boss.
episodes.title: Secretos en peligro

episodes.synopsis: Bruno returns home and Dana goes to the cemetery to visit Rivas' family. Mariano is jealous of Cristóbal, and Dana has another nervous episode.
episodes.title: Pasado de trampas

episodes.synopsis: Viviana discovers some secret photos of Ricardo and José Ángel in Barcelona. Mariano finds out that Nicolás and Cecilia are lovers.
episodes.title: Provocaciones prohibidas

episodes.synopsis: Isabel and Mariano reunite. Cecilia asks Bruno for a divorce. Cruz confesses to Cristóbal that he feels jealous over Dana.
episodes.title: Deseos ocultos

episodes.synopsis: The intimate relationship between José Ángel and Ricardo is revealed. Dana looks for some affection from her husband Mariano.
episodes.title: Camino de miedos

episodes.synopsis: Cecilia is in an accident and Nicolás del Valle is under investigation for child abuse. Dana distances herself from Detective Rivas.
episodes.title: Apagar la esperanza

episodes.synopsis: Mariano and Dana go to the morgue to identify the body, only to find it isn't Elisa. Bruno's construction project is approved.
episodes.title: Llamada del cielo

episodes.synopsis: Dana gets a phone call from Elisa and they figure out where she's calling from. Cecilia follows Viviana's advice, only to find Bruno with two women.
episodes.title: Infierno de esperanzas

episodes.synopsis: Mariano leaves Bruno out of the development project. Cecilia asks her brother to reconsider his decision and take Bruno back.
episodes.title: Cosechar enemigos

episodes.synopsis: Bruno leaves home. Mariano receives a photo of his daughter; he and Dana are convinced that Nicolás has something to do with Elisa's disappearance.
episodes.title: Prueba de vida

episodes.synopsis: Dana finds out that Bruno betrayed Cecilia and José Ángel tells Ricardo to go back to Spain. Elisa's kidnappers demand a million dollars.
episodes.title: Cobrar enemigos

episodes.synopsis: Bruno threatens Mariano saying that he'll tell Dana that Isabel is his lover. Ricardo and José Ángel have a romantic encounter.
episodes.title: Chantaje pasional

episodes.synopsis: Rodrigo is questioned by Cruz. Mariano confesses to Dana that he has been unfaithful.
episodes.title: Aventura peligrosa

episodes.synopsis: Mariano confesses to Dana that he and his secretary were having an affair. Ricardo tells José Ángel that he was deported to Spain.
episodes.title: Traiciones de soberbia

episodes.synopsis: Viviana finds out that Ricardo was deported and confronts him for lying. Dana goes to Cristóbal's apartment for a romantic interlude.
episodes.title: Pasiones y provocaciones

episodes.synopsis: Bruno hires Isabel as his secretary. Cruz finds Cristóbal and Dana kissing and the kidnappers communicate their demands.
episodes.title: Secuestrador misterioso

episodes.synopsis: Dana goes to meet with the kidnappers. The kidnappers discover that the police is onto them.
episodes.title: Rescate fallido

episodes.synopsis: The kidnappers keep the money and don't return Elisa. The police start working a new hypothesis: that she staged her own kidnapping.
episodes.title: Rumbo indefinido

episodes.synopsis: Dana finds Elisa's bank card in Mariano's wallet. Bruno and Cecilia have a romantic interlude; so do Ricardo y José Ángel.
episodes.title: Principal sospechoso

episodes.synopsis: Cristóbal asks Mariano about the tickets be bought for himself and Elisa. Dana is terribly hurt by Mariano's lies.
episodes.title: Sospecha de abuso

episodes.synopsis: Mariano and Dana give a TV interview. The District Attorney supports Cristóbal and his team.
episodes.title: Soborno y fuerza

episodes.synopsis: Mariano insists that there is someone on the police force who set him up to incriminate him. Mariano tries to bribe Cruz.
episodes.title: Refugio y confusión

episodes.synopsis: Cristóbal asks Gisela to play along with Mariano so he can accuse him of bribery. Bruno makes up with Cecilia and asks him to fire Nicolás.
episodes.title: Soborno y celos

episodes.synopsis: Ricardo and José Ángel spend the night together. Dana accuses Mariano of sneaking off on a trip with Elisa.
episodes.title: Alianzas peligrosas

episodes.synopsis: The police intercept a phone call between José Ángel and Ricardo. Detective Cruz goes after them; Dana follows and discovers what is going on.
episodes.title: Verdades ocultas

episodes.synopsis: Mariano hires a private detective to follow Dana. Flor tells Dana that Elisa is romantically involved with an older man.
episodes.title: Caprichos románticos

episodes.synopsis: The district attorney cites the Altamira family to go over the investigation report. Nicolás finds out that Dana has been visiting Cristóbal.
episodes.title: Golpe de poder

episodes.synopsis: José Ángel physically assaults Ricardo. Bruno is increasingly jealous about Nicolás. Mariano finds out that Dana and Cristóbal are lovers.
episodes.title: Confesar pecados

episodes.synopsis: Mariano has a heart attack and confronts Dana. Cristóbal tells the district attorney and chief of police the truth.
episodes.title: Fuera de conciencia

episodes.synopsis: Mariano confesses his distress to Cecilia. The district attorney suspends Cristóbal and takes over the case.
episodes.title: Culpabilidad segura

episodes.synopsis: Cristóbal continues his unofficial investigation. Bruno offers to let Ricardo direct a project and asks him point blank about his relationship.
episodes.title: Soberbia castigada

episodes.synopsis: Recent photos of Elisa are found in Mariano's car. Bruno and Cecilia renew their marriage vows.
episodes.title: Nuevos votos

episodes.synopsis: The whole family blames Dana for Mariano's stress. The judge orders that Mariano remain under house arrest.
episodes.title: Por tu culpa

episodes.synopsis: Cristóbal thinks he may have been wrong to implicate Mariano in Elisa's kidnapping. Mariano goes to Isabel for help.
episodes.title: Autor intelectual

episodes.synopsis: Bruno brings food to Elisa, who he has locked up, and accuses her of arranging her own kidnapping. Cristóbal speaks to Mariano.
episodes.title: Ruego íntimo

episodes.synopsis: Briceño sees Cristóbal when he goes to the police station to request information from Gisela. Cecilia finds a store receipt in Bruno's car.
episodes.title: Liberar rastros

episodes.synopsis: José Ángel doesn't know what to do when Viviana announces she's pregnant. Elisa dials her father from Bruno's cell phone, which he left behind.
episodes.title: Descuido fatal

episodes.synopsis: The board asks Mariano to step down as president and considers naming José Ángel interim president. Elisa is being held against her will by Bruno.
episodes.title: Derecho criminal

episodes.synopsis: Cecilia, suspecting that Bruno is up to something, decides to follow him. Cristóbal believes that it was the owner of the cabin who kidnapped Elisa.
episodes.title: Riesgo por amor

episodes.synopsis: Santiago searches Ricardo's apartment. The District Attorney requests that Mariano be moved to a prison.
episodes.title: Crímen oculto

episodes.synopsis: Mariano is transferred to a detention center and Elisa tries to escape. Santiago discovers that his father is having an affair with Ricardo.
episodes.title: Romper el silencio

episodes.synopsis: Cristóbal confesses to Dana that he doesn't think Mariano is guilty. Cristóbal suspects Bruno and Cecilia questions him about his constant absences.
episodes.title: Héroe y detective

episodes.synopsis: Dana asks Mariano to forgive her, saying she won't testify against him. Cristóbal and Dana break up while Bruno y Cecilia lie about Fabulet.
episodes.title: Pase de libertad

episodes.synopsis: Cristóbal is kicked out of his apartment and a compromising photo of José Ángel has gone viral. Meanwhile, Bruno is upset about Elisa's kidnapping.
episodes.title: Gesto de nobleza

episodes.synopsis: Bruno confesses his role in Elisa's kidnapping to Cecilia. Cristóbal reaches the cabin where Elisa is being held.
episodes.title: Testimonios delictivos

episodes.synopsis: Elisa is not in the cabin but Cristóbal finds her in the woods. Bruno is terrified and is surprised when he finds out that she's hurt.
episodes.title: Estado de coma

episodes.synopsis: They find a letter written by Elisa in the cabin. Ricardo discovers that Santiago is the mastermind behind his attack.
episodes.title: Acorralados

episodes.synopsis: Mariano gets out of jail, and Cristóbal believes Dana will not go back to him. Bruno has another panic attack.
episodes.title: Juego de evidencia

episodes.synopsis: José Ángel finds out that his son knows about his relationship with Ricardo. Bruno tapes his confession; Cecilia intercepts him before he can leave.
episodes.title: Operación vital

episodes.synopsis: Bruno thinks Cecilia shot Elisa. They find evidence that suggests Elisa had a relationship with the kidnapper.
episodes.title: Sueños mortales

episodes.synopsis: Ricardo admits to his relationship with José Ángel when Santiago confronts him about it. When Bruno rejects Cecilia, she seeks out Nicolás.
episodes.title: Despedida mortal

episodes.synopsis: The police interview Bruno after discovering irregularities in his statements. José Ángel feels more and more rejected by his son.
episodes.title: Sombra de culpa

episodes.synopsis: Cristóbal forces Bruno to come to the cabin where Elisa was being held so that they can talk. Viviana suspects something about José Ángel.
episodes.title: Sed de venganza

episodes.synopsis: A vigil is held in Elisa's school to pray for her. The police search Bruno's home.
episodes.title: Cargos irremediables

episodes.synopsis: Santiago kicks Ricardo out of the house and Cristóbal swears to Dana that he will find the culprit. Bruno is arrested at Elisa's funeral.
episodes.title: Infierno de inocentes

episodes.synopsis: Isabel finds out about José Ángel and Ricardo's relationship and Bruno confesses that he and Elisa were in love. Cecilia calls a press conference.
episodes.title: Prueba de polígrafo

episodes.synopsis: Bruno says he was home the day Elisa died and therefore could not have killed her. His children confirm his alibi.
episodes.title: Confesión intensa

episodes.synopsis: José Ángel confesses to his son that he is gay. Cecilia maintains Bruno's innocence, but they incarcerate him until the day of the trial.
episodes.title: Trampa de instintos

episodes.synopsis: Santiago won't let his father tell Viviana the truth. Dana visits Bruno in jail and confronts him about what happened.
episodes.title: Fantasmas del pasado

episodes.synopsis: Cecilia tells Bruno's lawyer that the police comissioner and Dana had an affair.
episodes.title: Visiones reales

episodes.synopsis: Bruno changes his statement, and Dana finds out about Cristóbal and Gisela's relationship. The police discover that Bruno was accused of sexual abuse.
episodes.title: Verdades reveladas

episodes.synopsis: José Ángel leaves Cecilia, and Bruno is attacked in jail. Dana becomes obsessed with Olga's drawings.
episodes.title: Armas sensibles

episodes.synopsis: Dana suffers withdrawl from anti-anxiety pills and Bruno is severely beaten in prison. Viviana insists she wants to get back together with José Ángel.
episodes.title: Intimidad pública

episodes.synopsis: The district attorney wants a psychological profile of Bruno's children, in addition to interviewing Cecilia. Dana wants to explain Olga's drawings.
episodes.title: Entre Sueños y perfiles

episodes.synopsis: The District Attorney asks Cecilia if Bruno may have abused his daughter, Flor. Dana takes Olga to the place where Elisa was held.
episodes.title: Pasado Oscuro

episodes.synopsis: Dana sees apparitions of Elisa and consults a psychic. Viviana proposes Ricardo partner with her in the dress shop.
episodes.title: Te tengo en mente

episodes.synopsis: A witness testifies that she was harassed by Bruno at university but denied it at trial. Viviana suspects something is wrong with Santiago.
episodes.title: Juicio de traiciones

episodes.synopsis: Bruno retracts his original statement, saying that he was coerced by the police comissioner. Evidence is presented to show Rivas is a violent person.
episodes.title: Evadir culpas

episodes.synopsis: Bruno is found innocent, and Cecilia discovers Nicolás and Isabel's relationship. The psychic deciphers the voice recorded in Elisa's room.
episodes.title: Pruebas Falsas

episodes.synopsis: Mariano asks Cristóbal to help him kill Bruno. Dana and Cristóbal discuss their love life.
episodes.title: Rastros del instinto

episodes.synopsis: Dana visits Bruno and confesses that she knows that he didn't kill Elisa. Mariano hires people to admonish Bruno.
episodes.title: Aliados de rabia

episodes.synopsis: Mariano files another lawsuit against Bruno; José Ángel and Ricardo's relationship intrigues Viviana. Bruno demands that Cecilia admit her guilt.
episodes.title: Delito femenino

episodes.synopsis: The district attorney confronts Cecilia about the check she gave Lorena in exchange for her silence. Mariano offers Isabel a job.
episodes.title: Mentiras descubiertas

episodes.synopsis: Mariano and Briceño plan to kill Bruno and make it look like an accident. José Ángel reveals to Viviana that he is gay.
episodes.title: Sin salida

episodes.synopsis: Eduardo offers to help the police and Dana dreams about a gun and some keys. Isabel finds the keys after Cecilia throws them away.
episodes.title: Cinismo asesino

episodes.synopsis: The police find the murder weapon and other objects like the ones in Dana's dreams. Viviana discovers that Santiago knows that his father is gay.
episodes.title: Asesinato doble

episodes.synopsis: Nicolás discovers Isabel's body. The keys found where Isabel was found coincide with the doors to Vicent Fabulet's property.
episodes.title: Complicidad enfermiza

episodes.synopsis: Cristóbal and Dana reaffirm their love. Cáceres's children suspect that their parents are guilty.
episodes.title: Exigencias de madre

episodes.synopsis: Viviana questions Ricardo's friendship and Gisela questions Cristóbal's love. Bruno fears that his children suspect them.
episodes.title: Trampa venenosa

episodes.synopsis: Nicolás accuses Bruno of killing Isabel and reveals that the cabin keys were in her pocket. A gang tries to kill Santiago.
episodes.title: Lágrimas falsas

episodes.synopsis: Mariano kicks José Ángel out of the company. Dana dreams that Cecilia shoots Elisa. Nicolás and Mariano seek out justice together.
episodes.title: Orden de detención

episodes.synopsis: Cecilia and Bruno decided to turn themselves in. Dana asks Mariano for a divorce and Bruno's children leave home.
episodes.title: Crimen al descubierto

episodes.synopsis: The district attorney offers Bruno a reduced sentence if he gives up Cecilia. Santiago defends his father, who risked everything for him.
episodes.title: Limite de locura

episodes.synopsis: Gisela breaks up with Cristóbal. Dana confronts Cecilia and accuses her of killing her daughter.
episodes.title: Huída frustrada

episodes.synopsis: The biochemical analysis shows that Bruno was drugged before he died, making suicide impossible. The police issue a warrant for Cecilia's arrest.
episodes.title: Fuga incierta

episodes.synopsis: Dana chases after Cecilia, who has escaped in Mariano's car with Flor as a hostage. Flor manages to call her uncle and tells him where they are.
episodes.title: Cita final

episodes.synopsis: Cecilia hurts Gisela. Dana has a dream about Elisa smiling and questions whether she should get a divorce or not.
episodes.title: Decision vital

episodes.synopsis: Final episode.
episodes.title: Gran Final
